ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 43
ygData.msgSnippet: I m sorry, but the Necromancer does NOT get a direct damage spell that does 1400 points of dmg.  It is possible that it is a DOT and that over a given peroid
ygData.messageBody:
I'm sorry, but the Necromancer does NOT get a direct damage spell that does
1400 points of dmg. It is possible that it is a DOT and that over a given
peroid of time it may do 1400, but the Ice Comet spell is THE highest Direct
Damage spell.

May I plz suggest that we put this behind us and move on to what this forum
is about, spell research?? To be perfectly honest, I don't care if the
necro is better than the wiz or not. I enjoy the character I play and if
you don't, then pick another character.

Talarin Kal'Amon, High Elven Wizard
----- Original Message -----
From: Shane <xscion@...>
To: <EQ_spell_research@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, June 14, 1999 11:44 AM
Subject: Re: [EQ_spell_research] Digest Number 43


> From: "Shane" <xscion@...>
>
> Level 49 Necromancer = 1400 damage for 300 mana, one cast. Now what do
you
> think of Ice Comet? End of story.
>
